## filterEdgesToNodes() function

Filters an edge list to only include connections between the nodes in the provided collection

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function filterEdgesToNodes(edges: ColumnTable, nodes: NodeCollection): ColumnTable;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  edges | ColumnTable | edge table |
|  nodes | [NodeCollection](./arquero.nodecollection.md) | nodes to filter with (as source/target) |

<b>Returns:</b>

ColumnTable
